features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication with Supabase Auth including signup, login, password reset, email verification, and protected routes

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Premium marketing landing page with Hero, Features, Testimonials, How It Works, Pricing, FAQ, and Final CTA sections

features.name: AI Chat Widget
features.description: Advanced chat widget with Groq AI integration, TTS disabled, browser STT support, emotion detection, and conversation quality tracking

features.name: Voice AI Assistant
features.description: Voice call functionality using Vapi AI SDK with voice selection, call management, real-time transcription, and error handling

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard with analytics, stats cards, charts, call logs, lead management, and payment tracking

features.name: Agent Setup
features.description: AI assistant configuration page with voice selection, model settings, custom instructions, and test call functionality

features.name: Settings Page
features.description: User settings page for profile management and preferences

features.name: Payment Processing
features.description: Payment integration with Flutterwave for subscription plans and billing management

features.name: Lead Management
features.description: Lead capture and management system with contact extraction, qualification, and tracking

features.name: Design System
features.description: Premium design system with typography (Playfair Display, Inter), color palette (Navy, Gold, Emerald), and premium shadows

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Error boundary component for catching and displaying JavaScript errors gracefully

features.name: User Tier Management
features.description: User tier system for managing subscription levels and feature access

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Shared utility functions for common operations

features.name: Legal Pages
features.description: Privacy policy and terms of service pages

features.name: Logo Component
features.description: Reusable logo component with size variants and color inversion support

features.name: Layout Component
features.description: Main layout wrapper with navigation and footer

features.name: App Router
features.description: React Router configuration with protected routes, public routes, and route guards

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Supabase client configuration and database connection setup
